system.descriptionText: Vehicle is entirely enclosed, crew cannot attack enemies outside the vehicle using their own personal weapons unless they have a way to get outside such as via a hatch or firing slit. Similarly, they cannot be targeted by those outside. Exceptions may include appropriate Mind-Based Psychic Attacks.

description.value: Vehicle is entirely enclosed, crew cannot attack enemies outside the vehicle using their own personal weapons unless they have a way to get outside such as via a hatch or firing slit.
